content: a cute and very easy to knit earwarmer headband you can knit this with ~ aran weight yarn 10ply worsted weight and 5mm needles ~ around 40g required or dk yarn 8ply light worsted and 4mm needles ~ around 20g required a simple 2 row repeat pattern and one of those is a knit row a perfect on the move project when you are away from home or travelling for an aduly woman or teen **** child version now added too **** i hope you enjoy knitting and wearing this m **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
